sentences: Benjamin Buss (pronounced [ˈbɛnjaˌmiːn bʊs]; best known by his stage name, Matthew Greywolf; born 7 October 1977) is a German musician and graphic designer.
He became interested in heavy metal music when he was 11 years old.
In 1994, along with other people he started a band Flowing Tears & Withered Flowers.
In 1995 along with his schoolmate Pascal Flach he founded Red Aim.
He started Powerwolf along with David Vogt in 2003.
When asked if he was a Christian or a Satanist, Matthew Greywolf answered: "I am a metalist, a metal fan.
Autumnblaze – Every Sun Is Fragile (2013; guitar on track 10 "Verglimmt")
